sen.j: 鳩居堂（きゅうきょどう）は、文房具・香の老舗である。
sen.e: Kyukyodo is a long-established store of stationary products and incense.
Kyukyodo is a long-established store of stationary products and incense.
Kyukyodo is a long-established store of stationary products and incense.

sen.j: 熊谷直実20代目の子孫を称する熊谷直心が1663年（寛文3年）に薬種商として創業。
sen.e: It was established in 1663 as a second-class drug seller by Jikishin KUMAGAI who referred to the 20th descendent of Naozane KUMAGAI.
It was established in 1663 as a second-class drug seller by Jikishin KUMAGAI who referred to himself as the 20th descendent of Naozane KUMAGAI.
sen.cmt: referred to himself as に訂正しました。
sen.e: It was established in 1663 as a second-class drug seller by Jikishin KUMAGAI who referred to himself as the 20th descendent of Naozane KUMAGAI.

sen.j: のち、中華人民共和国からの輸入文房具も取り扱うようになる。
sen.e: Later it began to sell stationary products imported from People's Republic of China.
Later it began to sell stationary products imported from People's Republic of China.
Later it began to sell stationary products imported from People's Republic of China.

sen.j: 屋号は儒学者・室鳩巣の命名。
sen.e: Its yago (the name of the store) was given by a Confusian scholar, Kyuso MURO.
Its yago (the name of the store) was given by a Confusian scholar, Kyuso MURO.
Its yago (the name of the store) was given by a Confusian scholar, Kyuso MURO.
